title: AP-Bruiser Item Concepts
body:
Phreakish Grimace (gold value w/o passives/active: 3073.5)

http://apollo-na-uploads.s3.amazonaws.com/1420479996996/tumblr_lyw71rIhBe1qhqju4.png

Materials:

- Specter's Cowl
- Haunting Guise
- 500 Gold (3200 total)

Stats:

- +500 health (gold value: 1333)
- +35 magic resist (gold value: 630)
- +50 ability power (gold value: 1087.5)
- UNIQUE; Passive - MADNESS: Damaging an enemy champion generates one stack every second for the next 4 seconds. Deal 2% increased damage for each stack, up to a maximum of 10%.
- UNIQUE; Passive - PSYCHOTIC GRIN: Staying close to enemy champions (within 325 units) for 2.5 seconds causes them to run away in fear for 1.5 second and decreases their magic resist by 15-25 for 5 seconds. Champions that were scared by this effect can't get feared again this way for 12 seconds.
_______________________

(Melee only) Blizzard's Choke-hold (gold value w/o passives/active: 3073.5)

Materials:

- Glacial Shroud
- Seekers Armguard
- 1000 Gold (3000 total)

Stats:

- +50 ability power (gold value: 1087.5)
- +65 armor (gold value: 1300)
- +300 mana (gold value: 420)
- +10% cooldown reduction (gold value: 266)
- UNIQUE; Active - Icey Grasp: 2.5 seconds after use on an enemy champion your next auto attack against this champion deals 60-180 magic damage and roots them for 1.5 seconds. Auto attacking them preemptively slows them instead for 50% and deals half damage. (Range: 1000; Cooldown: 60)
____________________

Sublime Soulflare Crown (gold value w/o passives/active: 2505)

Materials:

- Bami's Cinder
- Haunting Guise
- 400 Gold (2800 total)

Stats:

- +450 health (gold value: 1200)
- +60 ability power (gold value: 1305)
- UNIQUE; Passive - Immolate: Deals 21 - 38 (based on level) (+5% AP) magic damage per second to nearby enemies. Deals 50% bonus magic damage to minions and monsters (325 range).
- UNIQUE; Passive - Madness: Damaging an enemy champion generates one stack every second for the next 4 seconds. Deal 2% increased damage for each stack, up to a maximum of 10%.
- UNIQUE; Passive - Sublime Presence: The radius of circular AOEs from items (Locket of the Iron Solari, Frozen Heart, Abyssal Mask, etc.) is increased by 125.
____________________

I calculated the gold values with the values mentioned on this site:
http://leagueoflegends.wikia.com/wiki/Gold_efficiency

Feel free to leave critique in the comments.

replies.body:
Neat! 
I definitely think the cc effects might need the numbers lowered a little. The reason for that is free hard cc is hard to balance so cutting down their time a tad would make it more fair.

But I like them! I play a lot of ap bruiser mages (probably my favorite class) so it would be cool to see ideas like this.
I see what you mean. Taking away 0.5 seconds of cc on both of them and increasing the cooldown on Phreakish Grimace to something like 30 seconds might have been better.

Man I hope something like this comes into play within this year. I would be so happy. It would give champs like Galio, Gragas, Sylas, Morde etc will have more of a selection. Right now it feels like if you wanna play bruiser mage you just gotta stack all the health mage items which makes you extremely squish.

These seem like pretty decent ideas, although as Phield said free hard CC could be hard to balance especially psychotic grin 12 second cd per target is low. You would probably either have to change that to an active effect that persists while in combat and on exit combat a cooldown starts before it can be activated/triggered again or alternatively an active that last a set time before going on cd.

The only other issue I can think of is as with all potential AP bruiser items people have come-up with is can tanks abuse it. Sublime Soulflare Crown looks like an all-round better sunfire cape only losing 5 magic damage (actually thought it was 50 instead of 43) from the static aura for a scaling as well as two additional passives that negate the minor cost difference and could boost other tank items effectiveness making it a tempting item.

Anyway well done the effects show promise the Icey grasp one sounds great it forces them to delay an attack for the root or take the slow instead. Sorry if I sound like an asshole, its far easier to pick faults from someones idea than create one so don't be discouraged and once again good work.

It's okay, you dont sound like an asshole to me. I see your issue with Phreakish Grimace. The numbers could need some tweaking.

Regarding their effectivity on tanks, I felt like I kept the ability power on them low enough for them to not be so overly abusable, since AP tanks normally dont have the best ratios (I think). You barely see any AP tanks atm anyway, which is a bummer because I loved playing them (Nauti, Mao, etc.). So if they get some love with these as well I wouldn't mind that :P

SSC seemed okay to me because it doesn't give any resistances and even though it's aura has an AP scaling it's "Sublime Presence" Passive would give the incentive to buy tank items. This way the aura wouldn't deal to massive amounts of damage in (frankly) Thresh's AA range (since immolate is supposes to work with sublime presence) but rather just expand the range of teamfight oriented items. The affected items are all tank or support items. Locket, Frozen Heart, Randuins, Glory, Shurelia's and Abyssal. I think that's all of them. Maybe Zeke's and Redemption could also profit from it, didn't decide on that yet. Well, and of course Phreakish Grimace.

The one thing I really like about this is it would also open up some tanks to attempt an ap brusier build the same way some tanks can go a bruiser build. (J4 as an example)

{{champion:111}} would be yucky with all of these.

I feel we need AP bruiser items, but I dont know about these... Hard cc on an item seems like too much for League, having resistances on bruiser items seems like a very odd choice when regular bruiser items are notable for having health without resistances. And most importantly I feel like it does nothing to address two of the main issues for ap bruisers: Being able to get 20% cdr on an item that isnt full damage, and being able to get percent mr shred/penetration from an item that isnt full damage like Void.

Nice Idea

However, I think that the Pyschotic Grin passive should have a 55. 831 second cooldown on it and the fear duration should be decreased to 1.8927614273 seconds since CC is very cost effecient and final cost increased to 3120 gold.

It is nice but might has nightmarish interactions with champions like:
